data.name: AVANTI - The Joy of Driving
data.detailed_description:
Drive a kart on different locations in first person driver view only. Try to beat the race time of other players. You can select their ghost replay and see how they drive. To be faster you can configurate different settings of your car.



You can drive with keyboard (WASD or Arrow keys , R restart track , 1-9 for radio , /*-+ for volume control). Its a development focus that you can drive good with keyboard. Steering Wheel + Force Feedback and Gamepads are supported. (Gamepads are currently only used digital like keypress on/off)

In moment the game is focused on singleplayer only. Multiplayer racing will maybe added later. Content can be missing, added or removed while in development. How the game looks finally at the end of the development is open. Any comments or suggestions in discussions are welcome. When you found any bugs it would be nice when you can report them in discussions.
data.about_the_game:
Drive a kart on different locations in first person driver view only. Try to beat the race time of other players. You can select their ghost replay and see how they drive. To be faster you can configurate different settings of your car.



You can drive with keyboard (WASD or Arrow keys , R restart track , 1-9 for radio , /*-+ for volume control). Its a development focus that you can drive good with keyboard. Steering Wheel + Force Feedback and Gamepads are supported. (Gamepads are currently only used digital like keypress on/off)

In moment the game is focused on singleplayer only. Multiplayer racing will maybe added later. Content can be missing, added or removed while in development. How the game looks finally at the end of the development is open. Any comments or suggestions in discussions are welcome. When you found any bugs it would be nice when you can report them in discussions.
data.short_description: Drive a kart on different locations in first person driver view only and try getting a good racetime or just drive for relaxing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 , 11
  • Processor: Entry gaming system from 2016 (p.e. 3GHz Quad)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Entry gaming card from 2016 (p.e. NVIDIA GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 , ...)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Vulkan, Game is in development so requirements can change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 , 11
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 1600 or equal (Intel I7) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or equal or better (p.e NVIDIA GTX 1060)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS , Linux
  • Processor: Entry gaming system from 2016 (p.e. 3GHz Quad)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Entry gaming card from 2016 (p.e. NVIDIA GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 , ...)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: UBUNTU LTS
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 1600 or equal (Intel I7) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or equal or better (p.e NVIDIA GTX 1060)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan
